biocontainers.name: mikado
biocontainers.license: GNU Lesser General Public License v3 or later (LGPLv3+)
biocontainers.summary: A Python3 annotation program to select the best gene model in each locus

biotools.summary: A lightweight Python3 pipeline whose purpose is to facilitate the identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data and to select the best models in each locus.

bioschemas.name: Mikado
bioschemas.summary: A lightweight Python3 pipeline whose purpose is to facilitate the identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data and to select the best models in each locus.
